comment: I get cherry and lemon on the nose.  Taste is more cherry with wood and spice, medium long finish with more oak.  A great pour.  Expensive, yes, worth it?  I put it with my favorite bottles so yes for me.
Apple, cinnamon, spice, cherry. Mild heat, the proof carries the flavor. Medium finish.
Apple cinnamon nose. Moderately sweet. Mild spice with a medium finish. Not too much heat for the proof
